definition: to wait and see/to watch from the sidelines/to look around/to survey
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards

sentences.english: Therefore, these auto market pussyfooter, will affect Hangzhou city auto market to a great extent.
sentences.chinese: 因此，這些車市觀望者，將很大程度上影響杭城車市。

sentences.english: New findings may also require a “wait-and-see” attitude.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果有時也許要求人們持“觀望態度”。

sentences.english: In addition, most companies take a wait-and-see approach to new technologies.
sentences.chinese: 另外，大多數公司對合成儀器技術還是保持觀望態度。

sentences.english: I went from being on the fence about a sixth season to kind of hoping that there’ll be a seventh.
sentences.chinese: 剛剛還在觀望第六季的我已經開始翹首企盼第七季了。

sentences.english: As I watched, a gull flew by, above the spruces.
sentences.chinese: 在我觀望的時候，一隻海鷗飛過雲杉。

sentences.english: Or one to put on the back-burner and nab once you’ve upgraded your TV and computer?
sentences.chinese: 或是觀望看看，先升級電視和電腦？

sentences.english: Can stand back and take the road, the blood become river and even so.
sentences.chinese: 可回頭觀望來時的路，血流成河，縱使如此。

sentences.english: Experienced when the boom collapsed, many customers choose wait and see.
sentences.chinese: 在經歷暴漲暴跌時，許多客戶選擇觀望。

sentences.english: Operational advice, try water-holding, conservative investors wait and see.
sentences.chinese: 操作建議，試水多單持有，保守投資者觀望。

sentences.english: From thence she seeketh the prey, and her eyes behold afar off.
sentences.chinese: 從那裏窺看食物，眼睛遠遠觀望。

sentences.english: A good meal, a group of people caught Gu Man wait-and-see situation in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 喫好飯，一夥人全撞上了，顧曼在遠處觀望形勢。

sentences.english: Imagine you are sitting outside yourself, looking in.
sentences.chinese: 想象你坐在你自己的外面，朝內觀望。

sentences.english: Multinationals are hoarding their cash and cutting back on construction of new factories.
sentences.chinese: 跨國公司正在持幣觀望，削減新建工廠。

sentences.english: We walked through the gate of the picket fence and proceeded to look around.
sentences.chinese: 我們走過尖樁籬柵門，四處觀望。

sentences.english: As I watched, a gull flew by, above the spruces .
sentences.chinese: 在我觀望的時候，一隻海鷗在雲杉叢上飛掠而過。

definition: to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
to become hot/temperature rise/(fig.) to intensify/to hot up/to escalate/to get a boost
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
to bounce/to bounce back/to boomerang/to ricochet/rebound (of stock market etc)/bounce/backlash/negative repercussions
